entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight.
